It's a fun, quick puzzle game with a unique look and feel. Enjoy a run through, have a crack at the puzzle maps and enjoy the amusing writing. It really is quite a unique little game.
its pretty basic but it was the building block for portal 2 essentially still pretty fun

I just have gotten into video games recently and what a great way to start it off. This wasn't to hard and the story and plot where amazing. I've watched gameplays of other Valve games so I knew what to expect and it didn't disappoint. 

Also can I mention how good this game looks to this day?

Really awesome game that inspired a bunch of other really awesome games. 10/10
yes.
gud gme

Portal is one of the best and most important games that has probably ever been released. It incorporates elements of Horror, Puzzle, and Action into a beautiful masterpiece that sets in stone new ways to develop any of these genres of games. Even in 2020, it's still a banger to play because of the amazing story. Reccomended.

A solid puzzle game. Extremely fun and rewarding to finish. If I could wipe my mind to re-experience it spoiler-free I absolutely would.
Deserves all the hype it got.

One of the most unique games I have ever played. The soundtrack, the atmosphere, the feeling of being isolated, it all feels just right. I would definitely recommend checking this game and the rest of the orange box bundle out. 11/10.

This is an amazing strategy game, it is a lot of fun, it starts easy but the higher up you get in levels, the harder it gets, and it gets REALLY HARD! In total, it took me and my dad seven hours to complete WITH help from YouTube, I am ten years old btw. I would definitely recommend this game if you're up for a fun challenge.
